attribs.current: Convinto di essere destinato alla grandezza talvolta ingnora gli altri

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LssL769Mo442BaYaKpH_spelldescription
attribs.current: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range: Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute. You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute. You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute. You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers. You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut. You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LssPvNDCm-ndRbIlxhM_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LssQ1ElJ5gkHeKYbZ75_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LssQ487c1UYTP2hBHm1_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LssQ6V95AtojZk4dB8q_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LssQ6V95AtojZk4dB8q_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LssQDaIMyp5wMvNpOfB_itemcontent

attribs.name: character_backstory
attribs.current:
Nato in un villaggio sulle montagne delle terre meridionali a nord della città di Kenthemor, da una famiglia di tiefling si era reso famoso per la sua grossa stazza e la forza fuori dal comune, anche se i tiefling erano pochi e abbastanza rari lui e la sua famiglia sono riusciti a farsi accettare dalla comunità e ad ottenere il rispetto e la fiducia del resto del villaggio. Il padre fa il lavoro di carpentiere e la madre eccellendo nella magia si mise a fare l’insegnante di magia del villaggio, lui ha anche una sorellina più piccola di 8 anni più giovane di nome Elaria (Ea per gli amici-pelle rossa) un piccolo prodigio con la magia
Incapace di apprendere la magia anche se versato nelle lingue, mentre gli altri bambini andavano a studiare lui passava il tempo a esplorare la montagna scalando e cacciando anche nelle temperature più rigide, un giorno in particolare in una caverna buia nella quale si era riparato da una tormenta, trova un fiore rosso cremisi che brillava nel buio, attratto dalla sua luce tentò di coglierlo, ma al tocco il fiore svanisce in un barlume di luce che si scaglia velocemente sul suo braccio cambiando per sempre il colore della sua pelle del suo braccio destro in un rosso accesso. 
Un giorno durante una delle sue scarpinate per la montagna vede in difficoltà un dragoborn alle prese con un enorme worg, gettadosi in soccorso, lo salva dalla bestia e lo aiuta a rialzarsi, da qui inizia la sua conoscenza con Stonemoon il dragonborn cacciatore di taglie che lo invita ad aiutarlo nella sua professione come collega.
I 2 cominciarono così una amicizia forte legata dalle avventure in giro per la città, aiutando le persone che chiedevano aiuto contro creature e briganti che non potevano affrontare da sole.
Fosse perché entrambi erano diversi dalla massa di umani, nani e elfi che riempivano la città o perché erano totalmente opposti lui un grottesco tiefling di forza bruta a cui non piaceva troppo pensare e Stone un dragonborn che passava il suo tempo libero a accumulare e aumentare la conoscenza della storia e delle scienze, i due finirono per diventare grandi amici e molte volte andare a esplorare insieme e aiutare chi era in difficoltà con mostri e briganti.
In particolare una volta ha derubato un mercante corrotto e dato soldi ai poveri.
Usa il tempo libero leggendo i suoi libri, tentare di imparare a suonare una viola e aiutando i carpentieri locali a riparare le mura e costruire case
Di recente è tormentato da un sogno nel quale incontra in una foresta innevata una tiefling bianca che gli indica una montagna di ghiaccio a tre punte come una corona e dice “lo troverai li”

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LtEfCfem31LyRAmanLI_description
attribs.current:
In battle, you fight with primal ferocity. On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action.
While raging, you gain the following benefits if you aren’t wearing heavy armor:
-You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
-When you make a melee weapon attack using Strength, you gain a bonus to the damage roll that increases as you gain levels as a barbarian, as shown in the Rage Damage column of the Barbarian table.
-You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
If you are able to cast spells, you can’t cast them or concentrate on them while raging.
Your rage lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if you are knocked unconscious or if your turn ends and you haven’t attacked a hostile creature since your last turn or taken damage since then. You can also end your rage on your turn as a bonus action.
Once you have raged the number of times shown for your barbarian level in the Rages column of the Barbarian table, you must finish a long rest before you can rage again.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LtEfCfgpZnqFdZ2nZFh_description
attribs.current: While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor⁠ Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LtEfF1Zsm-gPkEgKZSQ_description
attribs.current: You have resistance to fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LtEfF1ZCyNBFd32npvZ_description
attribs.current: Thanks to your infernal heritage, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Ltn7BhJv1w7Np7I3Dva_description
attribs.current: Starting at 2nd level, you can throw aside all concern for defense to Attack with fierce desperation. When you make your first Attack on Your Turn, you can decide to Attack recklessly. Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon Attack rolls using Strength during this turn, but Attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-Ltn7XySpk00tIS11j66_description
attribs.current: At 2nd level, you gain an uncanny sense of when things nearby aren't as they should be, giving you an edge when you dodge away from danger. You have advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws against Effects that you can see, such as traps and Spells. To gain this benefit, you can't be Blinded, Deafened, or Incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LuwgZ5p7P-dqGJnxsJ4_spelldescription
attribs.current: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames. The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes 2d10 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LuwgZ5p7P-dqGJnxsJ4_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: 1 reaction, which you take in response to being damaged by a creature within 60 feet of you that you can see

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LuwgZ5p7P-dqGJnxsJ4_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LvS6njLIhtHuLDXJl3q_description
attribs.current: The arm of Zonturas become covered in flame allow him to attack the enemy for 1d4 fire damage buff in meele; This ability last for 1hour from the activation and renew after every short rest, it light the darkness for 15y radius, the arm become totally immune to fire, can't work under water and can be used to burn object like a torch.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LvWPhLv0NgR-ByouIMO_description
attribs.current: When you reach 3rd Level, you can cast the Hellish Rebuke spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a Long Rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LvZjO7bEq1uUEYIULtj_description
attribs.current:
Some deities inspire their followers to pitch themselves into a ferocious battle fury. These barbarians are zealots – warriors who channel their rage into powerful displays of divine power.

A variety of gods across the worlds of D&D inspire their followers to embrace this path. Tempus from the Forgotten Realms and Hextor and Erythnul of Greyhawk are all prime examples. In general, the gods who inspire zealots are deities of combat, destruction, and violence. Not all are evil, but few are good.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LvZjaKQGMgAFTMt1sEB_description
attribs.current: Starting when you choose this path at 3rd level, you can channel divine fury into your weapon strikes. While you're raging, the first creature you hit on each of your turns with a weapon attack takes extra damage equal to 1d6 + half your Barbarian level. The extra damage is necrotic or radiant; you choose the type of damage when you gain this feature.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LvZjpabIJU5kRpHH1R0_description
attribs.current: At 3rd level, your soul is marked for endless battle. If a spell, such as Raise Dead, has the sole effect of restoring you to life (but not undeath), the caster doesn't need material components to cast the spell on you.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-Lw3b2yeunPzLlgQ3LDb_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.current:
